title: Start
body:
Fruitmonger: Hey girls! How was the sparring today?
[[I won! |lying]]
[[Somebody snuck a barrel behind me!|deflecting]]

title: deflecting
body:
Renata: You forgot the part where I saved you!
Fruitmonger: Hahaha! You seem like you need some fruit to regain your energy! 
[[ I'd like some mangos! |mango]]
[[ I'd like some melon! |melon]]
[[ I'd like some bananas! |bananas]]

title: choosing
body:
Fruitmonger: Of course! You seem like you need some fruit to regain your energy! 
[[ I'd like some mangos! |mango]]
[[ I'd like some melon! |melon]]
[[ I'd like some bananas! |bananas]]

title: mango
body:
Fruitmonger: The mangos are great today! Good choice!
[[exit]]

title: exit
body:
<<detachFrom Renata Mia>>
<<pauseFor Fruitmonger 1>>
<<moveDown Mia 1 1>>
<<moveRight Renata 60 60>>
Renata: I bet I could cut this watermelon with my sword!
Mia: I bet that would get you into Roundier Haia's school!
<<moveDown FruitClerk 30 140>>
FruitClerk: Hey! You break it you pay for it!
<<moveDown Renata 20 150>>
<<moveLeft Renata 100 150>>
<<moveDown Mia 20 80>>
<<moveLeft Mia 60 80>>
Renata: hahahahahahaha!!!<<attachTo Renata Mia>>
